text: Ischnaspis is a genus of armored scale insects in the family Diaspididae. There are about seven described species in Ischnaspis. ==Species== These seven species belong to the genus Ischnaspis: * Ischnaspis ghesquierei Matile- Ferrero, 1982 * Ischnaspis longirostris (Signoret, 1882) * Ischnaspis macrolobii Laing, 1932 * Ischnaspis remaudierei Matile-Ferrero, 1982 * Ischnaspis silvestrii Leonardi, 1914 * Ischnaspis spathulata Lindinger, 1911 * Ischnaspis tecleae Ben-Dov, 1974 ==References== Category:Lepidosaphidini Category:Sternorrhyncha genera
title: Ischnaspis
